casebody.data:
Abraham Levy, as Administrator, etc., Respondent v. The Knickerbocker Ice Company, Appellant. Decided March 2, 1891. Appeal by defendant from judgment entered on verdict of jury and from order denying motion for a new trial made upon the minutes. Maclay & Forrest, for appellant. Alfred Steckler, for *581respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Dugro, J.

Per Curiam.

Judgment and order affirmed, with costs.
